schema.phoneNumberMinLength: Phone number must be at least 10 digits
schema.phoneNumberMaxLength: Phone number must not exceed 15 digits
schema.phoneNumberDigitsOnly: Phone number must contain only digits
schema.dobInvalidFormat: Date of birth must be a valid date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
schema.dobInThePast: Date of birth must be in the past
schema.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
schema.passwordLowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
schema.passwordUppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
schema.passwordNumberRequired: Password must contain at least one number
schema.passwordSpecialCharRequired: Password must contain at least one special character
schema.paginationOrderInvalid: Invalid pagination order. Must be 'ASC' or 'DESC'
